display_help: Swings your Battle Axe horizontally at neck level. Deals very high damage, and can send a target flying. However, this attack is very Slow.
display_short_help: Melee Lethal, Very High Dam, Knockdown
display_target_help: Swings your Battle Axe horizontally at neck level. Deals very high damage, and can send a target flying. However, this attack is very Slow.
display_target_short_help: Melee Lethal, Very High Dam, Knockdown

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
